text: Ntimukajye muhamagara Intumwa y’Imana (mu mazina yayo bwite) nk’uko muhamagarana hagati yanyu (Ahubwo mujye mumwubaha muvuge muti ‘Yewe Ntumwa y’Imana!’ Rwose Allah azi abasohoka rwihishwa muri mwe bikingakinga ku bandi. Bityo, abigomeka ku mategeko yayo (Intumwa) bajye bitwararika batazavaho bakagerwaho n’ikigeragezo cyangwa bakagerwaho n’ibihano bibabaza
